name: Autobahn Chaos
description:
2D arcade style shoot-em-up. Protect the plane and yourself from incoming attacks from trucks, police cars, helicopters, gunships, jets and extraterrestrials. Why are you protecting the plane? Is there government conspiracy? Is Barry Seal attempting to escape with a plane full of drugs? Are aliens behind everything? You will not find the answer to those questions in this game, but you will get to shoot a lot of things.

I hope you enjoy my first game. Thanks for taking a look at it. Much love to anyone that supported the initial release with a donation, your support is what keeps me going while working on the next game. xoxo - Jim

CREDITS: CODE, ART, DESIGN & SFX - Jim Lessels - BETA TESTING - Ben Van Eijk - MUSIC - Gunnar Olsen - Detour, AJ7 - Level Up, Vibe Tracks - Invisible - SOUND EFFECTS - Mark DiAngelo, freesfx.uk.co
